display_long_description:
Enter the Neon Future – Now in VR!
Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping ride in Neon Nexus VR, a fully immersive cyberpunk racing game. Explore a massive open-world city, master high-speed drifts, and conquer daring challenges—all in stunning virtual reality.
Key Features:
🚗 Ultimate VR Racing Experience – Feel the rush as you race through a futuristic city in high-speed cybercars. Experience realistic driving physics like never before in full VR.
🏙️ Open-World Megapolis – Explore a vast cyberpunk metropolis filled with hidden shortcuts, vertical highways, and neon-lit cityscapes.
🌀 Drift, Jump & Soar – Perform gravity-defying drifts, jumps, and aerial maneuvers using futuristic flying vehicles, gliders, and more.
💡 VR-Optimized Immersion – Enjoy hand-tracking controls, cockpit view driving, and interactive environments that bring the cyberpunk world to life.
🔥 Missions & Upgrades – Take on thrilling racing challenges, earn rewards, and upgrade your fleet of cyber vehicles to dominate the streets.
🏁 Race, Explore & Conquer – Test your skills in open-world free driving, challenge other racers, or cruise through the city in style.
The neon-lit future of racing is here. Are you ready to rule the streets of Megapolis in VR?
